projectDescription: Stunning 3-Bedroom Home for Sale in Ely, Cambridge - £450,000  Initial Interest: Explore this beautiful property, perfectly located in the charming town of Ely. Start with a viewiProperty For sale: Ely, Cambridge. Offer and Acceptance: Once your offer is accepted, we'll move swiftly into the conveyancing phase. Your legal team will handle document exchanges and necessary searches to clear any legal encumbrances.  Mortgage and Surveys: Secure your mortgage with a valuation survey to confirm the property’s worth matches your financing. Upon mortgage approval and positive survey outcomes, you're set for the next big step.  Exchange of Contracts: Commit legally to the purchase by exchanging contracts with the seller. At this stage, the transaction becomes legally binding, and a completion date is agreed upon.  Completion: Finalize your purchase on the set date with the transfer of funds. Collect the keys to your new home and start your new chapter in Ely.

milestones.title: Initial Interest
milestones.description: Schedule and conduct property viewing, Discuss potential offer and terms with real estate agent

milestones.title: Offer and Acceptance
milestones.description: Make an official offer for the property, Engage a legal team for the conveyancing process
milestones.paymentDetails: : Legal fees applicable (varies depending on the legal firm)

milestones.title: Mortgage and Surveys
milestones.description: Apply for a mortgage from a bank or financial institution, Schedule and conduct a valuation survey
milestones.paymentDetails: : Mortgage application and survey fees applicable (varies depending on the bank and survey company)

milestones.title: Exchange of Contracts
milestones.description: Review and sign contracts, Agree on a completion date
milestones.paymentDetails: : A deposit is usually required at this stage (typically 10-20% of the purchase price)

milestones.title: Completion
milestones.description: Transfer the remaining funds, Collect keys and other necessary documents
milestones.paymentDetails: : Final payment of the remaining balance of the purchase price
